about_the_game:
Story




Uh oh! It seems our protagonist was a bit too rough with her ex-boyfriend. After being incapable of putting up with Selene’s insatiable lust, Selene’s Ex broke off their relationship. Traumatized from being dumped, Selene has chosen to keep the overtly lustful side of her personality locked away.

Now living on her own, she has been mostly successful in this endeavor despite a few strange friendships and some lonely nights. Things quickly change, however, as the woman’s somewhat calm and solitary life get turned upside down. Twin demons (a succubus and an incubus), secretly parading as humans, have suddenly moved in next door to her.
Once the two mischievous and sultry twins find out that their “dear neighbor” is having a bit of a crisis, the demons decided to take on the task to “fix” her. Regardless of the consequences…



Features

  • Two unexpected art styles mesh together to deliver a quirky story about a woman who comes to terms with her previous relationship through copious amounts of supernatural sex. Consider this a "lighter" take on corruption and moral degeneration, while still containing everything you love from the genre.

  • Tired of your typical, boring “visual novel” tunes? We are too!

    W!?MNAD!!?’s soundtrack takes center stage featuring a funky, smooth, and sensual soundtrack. Critical Bliss aims to deliver a memorable, "A E S T H E T I C" fueled experience. Expect the ost to explore genres suck as lo-fi/trip-hop, R&B, Soul, Acid Jazz and more.

  • W!?MNAD!!? explores a lot of fetishes and fetishistic scenarios. Expect a mix of variety and themes.

  • Extra content is hidden throughout W!?MNAD!!?. Make sure you're paying attention or you might miss out on some interesting side stories told in a completely different setting!

  • Critical Bliss strives to have an ear for quality and sound direction. Look forward to well-directed groaning, moaning, panting, and other luscious murmurs echoing in the background.
detailed_description:
Check This Out!



About the Game

Story




Uh oh! It seems our protagonist was a bit too rough with her ex-boyfriend. After being incapable of putting up with Selene’s insatiable lust, Selene’s Ex broke off their relationship. Traumatized from being dumped, Selene has chosen to keep the overtly lustful side of her personality locked away.

Now living on her own, she has been mostly successful in this endeavor despite a few strange friendships and some lonely nights. Things quickly change, however, as the woman’s somewhat calm and solitary life get turned upside down. Twin demons (a succubus and an incubus), secretly parading as humans, have suddenly moved in next door to her.
Once the two mischievous and sultry twins find out that their “dear neighbor” is having a bit of a crisis, the demons decided to take on the task to “fix” her. Regardless of the consequences…



Features

  • Two unexpected art styles mesh together to deliver a quirky story about a woman who comes to terms with her previous relationship through copious amounts of supernatural sex. Consider this a "lighter" take on corruption and moral degeneration, while still containing everything you love from the genre.

  • Tired of your typical, boring “visual novel” tunes? We are too!

    W!?MNAD!!?’s soundtrack takes center stage featuring a funky, smooth, and sensual soundtrack. Critical Bliss aims to deliver a memorable, "A E S T H E T I C" fueled experience. Expect the ost to explore genres suck as lo-fi/trip-hop, R&B, Soul, Acid Jazz and more.

  • W!?MNAD!!? explores a lot of fetishes and fetishistic scenarios. Expect a mix of variety and themes.

  • Extra content is hidden throughout W!?MNAD!!?. Make sure you're paying attention or you might miss out on some interesting side stories told in a completely different setting!

  • Critical Bliss strives to have an ear for quality and sound direction. Look forward to well-directed groaning, moaning, panting, and other luscious murmurs echoing in the background.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 14.04+, Debian 8+, openSUSE 13.1+, or Fedora Linux 21+
  • Processor: Pentium 4 - 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Pentium 4 - 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: What!? My Neighbors Are Demons!!?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 - 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Due to her insatiability in a failed relationship, Selene is attempting to keep her unusual lust under control. However, things start getting strange (and lewd) when a pair of mischievous sex demons move in next door to her. It doesn't take rocket science to figure out where this is going!
